analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato parittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ paritta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo mahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ mahaggata ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo appamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ appamāṇa ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
